<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7+"
    pfs=""
>
[Cold Comfort](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1259)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Cold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=27" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 18</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The contraption called cold comfort is a watertight pouch filled with a handful of small, heavy, silvery pellets. When emptied into an adjacent body of water, the pellets freeze the water's surface almost instantly, creating an ice block in a 10-foot square to a depth of 1 foot. Any creatures inside this space must attempt a DC 23 Reflex save. On a failure, the creature takes 2d6 cold damage and is [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) for 1 minute or until it [Escapes](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) (DC 20) or the ice is broken. The entire ice block has AC 10, Hardness 10, and 40 Hit Points, and it's immune to critical hits, [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) damage, and precision damage. The ice is strong enough to support one Large creature or up to four Medium or Small creatures. Traversing the slippery ice requires a successful DC 20 [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) check to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=28).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

level="2"

Cold Comfort (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 18</row>

**Price** 70 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

Ice created by the pellets lasts for 1 hour or until broken.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 15"
pfs="Standard"
>
Cold Comfort (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 18</row>

**Price** 1,300 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The area increases to a 20-foot square, the save DC increases to 34, the cold damage increases to 4d6 and the Escape DC increases to 31. Ice created by the pellets lasts for 3 hours or until broken. The block of ice is strong enough to support one Huge creature, up to 2 Large creatures, or up to 8 Medium or Small creatures.
